何がいけないのよ！
google_translated:
It is used in house
What don't you do!

en_text: Because you tried so hard to be one,
jp_text:
あんたが頑張るから
私も頑張らざるをえなかった！
google_translated:
Because I will do my best
I had to work hard!

en_text:
Why wouldn't you stay at 
the bottom with me?
jp_text:
何で一緒に
落ちぶれてくれなかったの？

en_text: That's the only reason.
jp_text: それだけだよ

en_text: Sorry.
jp_text: ごめんな

en_text: Onee-chan, don't let go!
jp_text: （真依）絶対 置いてかないでよ

en_text: Jeez, give it a rest.
jp_text: （真依）絶対だよ

en_text: Of course I won't.
jp_text: 大っ嫌い…

en_text: I'm hungry.
jp_text: （三輪）おなか 減ったなあ

en_text:
If I recall, the edamame I had left over 
from lunch was in the fridge...
jp_text: 昼に残した枝豆が…

en_text: Please look at least a little guilty!
jp_text:
（三輪）もう少し
申し訳なさそうにしてくださいよ
google_translated:
a little more
Please do anything else

en_text:
No, I'm not interested 
in late-night cup ramen.
jp_text:
（三輪）いや
さすがに 深夜のカップラーメンは
google_translated:
No
As expected, the late-night coupler

en_text: How about this?!
jp_text: これなら どう？

en_text: Two: fill the container halfway with milk.
jp_text: 2 牛乳は容器の半分くらい
google_translated: 2 Milk is about half of the container

en_text: Three: add hot water up to the line inside!
jp_text: 3 熱湯を内側の線まで
google_translated: 3 Hot water to the inner line

en_text: I-It's good!
jp_text:
（三輪）
すごいおいしいですよ これ！

en_text: Right?
jp_text: （桃）でしょ？

en_text:
You could've just eaten 
this if it's so good.
jp_text:
こんなに おいしいなら
こっちを食べれば よかったのに
google_translated:
If so delicious
She was good if I ate here

en_text:
Well, you still pay for late-night 
cup ramen the next day.
jp_text:
いや さすがに
深夜のカップラーメンは翌日に響く
google_translated:
Hesitantly
Late-night coupler sounds the next day

en_text: Uh-huh.
jp_text: うんうん
